text:
Observations from Eagles night practice:
1) The top two receivers at camp so far, for me, have been Quez Watkins and Travis Fulgham. They carried the night offensively. Watkins had 3 leaping/diving catches, Fulgham with a 3rd down catch along sideline over Nelson.
